topic.title: Medication Dispense Assigned Entity - conformance rules

ol.li: SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:7468)
The content of addr SHALL be a conformant US Realm Address (AD.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.2) (CONF:10565)
Contains at least one [1..*] id, where its data type is II
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:7468)
The content of addr SHALL be a conformant US Realm Address (AD.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.2) (CONF:10565)

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <assignedentity xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <id root="1985311620"/> <addr/> </assignedentity>
